name: Red-Metrik
description: It is a version of the internet browser base "Terometrik" renewed, Simple interface, fast and intuitive search, 100% adaptive to the user It does not extract information from the client's browser or network.   no search history or suggestion bar or news section, services or advertising. Red-Metrik the most basic and effective way to surf the net... You may consider donating to cvksoftware development studio if you like the app...
